name: Battle x: Winnie the Pooh V 0.01
name_original: Battle x: Winnie the Pooh V 0.01
description:
This is a major upgrade from the first one.

you are the friends of the hundred-acre woods. you have to defend the last beehive from ghosts. strategically place towers and defend the honey.

I plan on updating this game regularly, adding stuff and fixing stuff.

if you have any feedback please comment below.
